message: Open OBS.
What is the title for this week?
Schedule 9 AM stream on Facebook with persistent key.
Schedule 9 AM stream on YouTube with Default stream key.
Go to Black scene.
Hit START buttons beside Facebook and YouTube.
Go to Intro scene.
Check that the stream started OK on YT, FB and Church Online.
When countdown begins, go to Cameras scene.
Have fun! Mistakes happen, just roll with it.
When stream viewers are dismissed, go to Outro scene.
After in-person ends, ensure Projector is going out to the building.
When the timer hits 0, stop streaming by tapping Stop buttons beside Facebook and YouTube.
Schedule 11 AM stream on Facebook with persistent key.
Schedule 11 AM stream on YouTube with Default stream key.
Go to Black scene.
Hit START buttons beside Facebook and YouTube.
Go to Intro scene.
Check that the stream started OK on YT, FB and Church Online.
When countdown begins, go to Cameras scene.
Have fun! Mistakes happen, just roll with it.
When stream viewers are dismissed, go to Outro scene.
After in-person ends, ensure Projector is going out to the building.
When the timer hits 0, stop streaming by tapping Stop buttons beside Facebook and YouTube.
